content.text: Yesterday , the rapper was found guilty of her manslaughter by gross negligence and supplying a class A drug after Louella overdosed in woodland at Bestival just hours short of her 25th birthday in September 2017 . During the trial , Louella 's heartbroken sister Daisy was heard begging Broughton for an apology over what happened and after the conviction dad John , 62 , declared the family were all serving a life sentence .
